I ended up needing a pair of sunglasses after driving down to see my parents and forgetting my Ray-Bans at home. I ended up getting three pairs of these, since they were $15, and I wasn’t sure how they’d look. I figured I could just return the pairs I didn’t want, but, as it turns out, I’m keeping all three pairs.  These sunglasses have to be one of the best chances I’ve taken on a random Amazon purchase. These sunglasses are great; they are attractive and fit me well. I wore them all day yesterday, and they were still comfortable at the end of the day. The polarized lenses seem to offer good sun protection, and they definitely cut down on glare as well as some more expensive glasses I’ve owned.  Not sure about the overall durability (they are fairly cheap, after all), but they do feel reasonably well made. I don’t expect them to last forever, but they are priced such that if they break or get lost, I won’t be disappointed. Appreciated the inclusion of a cleaning cloth and a small storage bag. On the whole, I am very pleased with these and will definitely be buying more in the future, especially if there is a style that is a bit more…eccentric…that I wouldn’t want to spend too much on.

Cute sunglasses, liked the look, but they are the cheapest plastic ever. I wore them the very first day of vacation, went to clean them that afternoon and the frame snapped in half popping the lense out. I was not being rough at all. Tossed them in the trash. Literally, these are trash.

评论概述: So disappointed, lenses warped, completely unwearable.
评论详情: I bought these sunglasses before a vacation and was excited to receive them based on the great reviews here. They have an Oliver Peoples vibe without the price tag.  However, from the moment they arrived there were issue. First, the hinges would barely open without significant force requiring me to use WD40 on the brand new pair of glasses. They worked well after that, until a layer of the lens began to bubble and warp. As you can see from the photo they are completely unwearable as the defect is visible to anyone you walk by. For context I have owned these for less than a year and I live in the Northeast US so there are no extreme temperatures.  Two thumbs down for these Sojos, stay away.

Been buying expensive sunglasses from different brands, and I have to say that, surprisingly, this sunglasses is so far the most functional and comfortable. I got one of the same style from Oliver peoples a few years back, and I think this is more comfortable and that I can see better wearing these. However, the frame does feel flimsy and cheap; the legs do not move smoothly. I do not think these attributes create any problems; considering the price point, I am definitely happy with this purchase.
